title: How the Postal Service Prioritizes Customer Care
description: This week on Mailin' It, we are joined by the Postal Service’s VP of Customer Experience, Marc McCrery, and the Director, Consumer Advocate, Nathan King, to learn how we manage customer care here at the Postal Service. Join us as we’ll dive into the different aspects of customer experience and the work that goes into serving the Postal Service’s extensive customer base. We’ll also talk about addressing customer concerns, methods to track consumer satisfaction, ways you can reach the Postal Service, and more!
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
